column4: guys seriously my gnome keeps crashing every day and i have to restart it kk 9.10 because im using an intellimouse
how can i find out how its messing the gdm up
do you have a spare mouse to test this with?
what do you mean, test it as in see if it does not crash
yes to see if in fact it is the intelli mouse
it is definatly the intellimouse because the mouse messes up first and then the whole gnome starts to lock up
just be sure to shut down the computer to change the mouse unless it is usb
why did i not think about unplugging it before !!!!
ive just unplugged it and gnome came back to me
so that answers 2 questions in one go
now what you could do is google the make of the mouse with ubuntu to see if there are issues and any solutions :)

it  good to get into practice  googling especially with hardware issues once you have isolated it as actually being hardware....even though there are many people here with many different types of hardware... not always the right people when you need an answer :)
